BugInstance.message: Enum class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.config.props.internal.InternalConfigurationPropertyKey only declares one enum value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.metadata.UnrecognizedDatabaseURLException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
